name: Bolstering Lantern
desc: Increase your attack speed by 10% (+3.5% per stack) for up to 3 (+1 per stack) enemies and allies within 20 meters.
notes:
Bolstering Lantern is an item in Risk of Rain 2, added in the Seekers of the Storm expansion.
Each enemy and ally within 20m grants the holder a   Lantern Buff stack, increasing the holder's attack speed by 10% (+3.5% per stack). The Lantern Buff can stack up to 3 (+1 per stack) times.


== Notes ==
The Bolstering Lantern's area of effect is indicated by a blue-green ring on the ground around the holder.
Individual stacks of the Lantern Buff are immediately added/removed as enemies and allies enter/leave the radius.

== Version History ==
Update Notes V1.3.8
Scaling is now more focused on the item's utility rather than increasing its effective range. It now grants 10% (+ 3.5% per stack) attack speed (up from a flat 7.5%). That effect is granted per Monster or Ally in a 20 meter range up to 3 (+ 1 per stack). The range no longer scales with additional Lanterns.
